description: Combining aspirin and paracetamol may increase the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding.
management_recommendations: Use caution and monitor for signs of bleeding.

description: Combining aspirin and ibuprofen may increase the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding.
management_recommendations: Avoid concurrent use or use with caution under medical supervision.

description: Combining paracetamol and ibuprofen may potentiate the analgesic effects.
management_recommendations: May be used together for added pain relief, but monitor for adverse effects.

description: Combining cough syrup and paracetamol may increase the risk of drowsiness and dizziness.
management_recommendations: Use caution when driving or operating machinery.
